kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
It's possible we'll see even more URL management capabilities in the Former URL application in the future. If it's used for managing all redirects, I wonder if it should be renamed 🤔.
As a marketer managing 500+ reusable content items (and growing daily) in the Kentico Community Portal, I really love the [improved Content hub column sizing](/blog/xperience-by-kentico-refresh-january-23-2025#content-hub-ux) - it's a lot easier to quickly find what I'm looking for.
I'm brainstorming scenarios where I'll use the new update a [contact field automation step](/blog/xperience-by-kentico-refresh-january-23-2025#update-a-contact-step), but I guess that's the wrong perspective - instead I should be focusing on making a better visitor experience in the Community Portal and then using the tools (like automations) to make that possible!
